derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin, literally light'

means.word_mean: 1. a unit of luminous flux equal to the amount of light given out through a solid angle of 1 steradian by a point source of 1 candela intensity radiating uniformly in all directions
2. a cavity or passage in a tubular organ;
